Fig 3.49 Echocardiogram of a 35-yr-old patient who presented with 
severe exertional dyspnoea and several episodes of syncope. Look at 
the large mass (cardiac myxoma) in left atrium. Abbreviations: RV: right 
ventricle; LV: left ventricle; AV: aortic valve; AO: aorta; MV: mitral valve.
